item.title: Drawing Smooth 2D Graphs using UIBezierPath
item.description: We have been working on multiple projects that required drawing 2D line graphs given a set of points. UIKit gives us the versatile UIBezierPath, which allows us to create a straight line graph by appending segments using addLineToPath for each point in our array. Easy, but not really pretty. There are two different kinds of curves in UIBezierPath: quadratic curves with a single control point (addQuadCurveToPoint) and cubic curves with two control points (addCurveToPoint).
